me wana wita nawika hamudawa yatathe deshiya aarakshawa sapayanu labana deshiya eejanthawarun 29k ha wideshiya eejanthawarun 106k sitina athara ee siyaluma eejanthawarun haraha samudra aarakshawa awashya naukawanta aayudha suraksha kirime ee sewawa sapayanu atha. 2015 wasare nowambar masa 13 wanida sita 2019 wasare mayi 27 wanida dakwa wu kalaya thula nawika hamudawa haraha me meheyum sidu kirimedi aayudha 53069k suraksha kara bara di athi athara eewa gena aya 13148k meheyawa atha.
